trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe viene utilizzata principalmente dal gestore code di destinazione quando l'autenticazione del messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è impostata da Accodamento messaggi e viene utilizzata il gestore delle code per verificare chi ha inviato il messaggio e che il mittente disponga dei diritti di accesso alla coda di ricezione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica la versione di Accodamento messaggi consente di inviare il messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è importante da tenere presenti quando si utilizzano funzionalità quali l'elaborazione delle transazioni, che è supportata solo da Accodamento messaggi versione 2.0 e versioni successive, o le firme digitali, che vengono utilizzate per autenticare i messaggi inviati dalla versione 1.0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene impostato dal gestore delle code mittente quando viene inviato il messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class indicates the sending machine's date and time when the message was sent by the source Queue Manager.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe indica il computer di invio data e ora di invio il messaggio dalla coda di gestione di origine.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: Consente di recuperare tutte le proprietà di messaggio quando si riceve un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Use SetAll to set all Boolean <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare SetAll per impostare tutte booleano <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo tutte le proprietà di messaggi da recuperare durante la ricezione di messaggi.

trans-unit.source: SetAll does not affect the values for <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: SetAll non interessano i valori per <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, o <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling SetAll, you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato SetAll, è possibile impostare i singoli valori del filtro su `false` per limitare le proprietà recuperate quando viene ricevuto il messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Sets the filter values of common Message Queuing properties to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the integer-valued properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Imposta i valori di filtro delle proprietà comuni di Accodamento messaggi in <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e le proprietà con valori integer in base ai valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Use SetDefaults to set the following <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> Boolean-valued properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Consente di impostare le seguenti SetDefaults <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>proprietà con valori booleani `true`.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: These are the most common properties a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> will typically interact with the following: - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> SetDefaults sets the properties in the following table to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Queste sono le proprietà più comuni un <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>interagisce con i seguenti:- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A>SetDefaults imposta le proprietà nella tabella seguente i valori predefiniti.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|1024| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|255| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|255| The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents a <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> on which SetDefaults has been called.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore predefinito | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|&1024; | | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|&255; | | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|&255; | Il <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta un <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>in cui è stato chiamato SetDefaults.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the computer where the message originated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica del computer in cui ha origine il messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica il tempo totale espresso in secondi per un messaggio inviato venga ricevuto dalla coda di destinazione.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application.
trans-unit.target: Il limite di tempo per il messaggio viene recuperato dalla coda di destinazione include il tempo impiegato per raggiungere la coda di destinazione, oltre il tempo di attesa nella coda prima che il messaggio viene recuperato da un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica di un limite di tempo in secondi, dal momento in cui viene inviato il messaggio relativo alla coda di destinazione.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe identifica la transazione che ha inviato il messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà all'interno di un'applicazione ricevente per verificare che un messaggio è stato inviato come parte di una transazione specifica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe identifica la coda di stato transazioni sul computer di origine.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà viene utilizzata per l'invio di messaggi di riconoscimento all'applicazione mittente.

trans-unit.source: The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: Coda di stato delle transazioni viene utilizzata dalle applicazioni di connessione durante la ricezione di messaggi di transazione inviati a una coda esterna.

trans-unit.source: A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: Una coda esterna esiste in un sistema di accodamento diverso da Accodamento messaggi Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: Accodamento messaggi Microsoft comunica con queste code tramite un'applicazione di connessione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica se il messaggio deve essere autenticato.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile esaminare le proprietà di un messaggio e determinare se un messaggio di autenticazione non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.
trans-unit.target: Messaggi non autenticati verranno eliminati e non vengono recapitati alla coda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether a copy of a message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica se una copia di un messaggio non recapitato deve essere inviata a una coda di messaggi non recapitabili.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> le informazioni della proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether to encrypt a message.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica se crittografare un messaggio.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica se una copia del messaggio deve essere conservata in un computer di origine.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se recuperare <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni sulle proprietà quando si riceve o si visualizza un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe specifica se la traccia della route di un messaggio mentre si sposta verso la coda di destinazione.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue.
trans-unit.target: Se `true`, ogni volta che il messaggio originale passa attraverso un server di accodamento, viene inviato un messaggio di rapporto generato Accodamento messaggi alla coda dei rapporti di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo dell'analisi, è necessario configurazione di Active Directory e specificare una coda dei rapporti di Accodamento messaggi.

trans-unit.source: These settings are configured by the administrator.
trans-unit.target: Queste impostazioni vengono configurate dall'amministratore.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per ricevere <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informazioni; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
